sentences.en: " He's been promising me a big deal.
sentences.cn: “ 他一直答应要给我派个好差事.

sentences.en: A school has honoured one of its brightest and most promising former pupils.
sentences.cn: 一所学校给曾在这里就读的最聪明、最有前途的一位学生授予了荣誉头衔。

sentences.en: After promising to keep the book for me, he broke his word and sold it to someone else.
sentences.cn: 他答应把书留给我之后, 却食言而把它卖给了别人.

sentences.en: All promising young cricketers would like to play for England.
sentences.cn: 所有年轻有为的板球运动员都愿意为英格兰打球.

sentences.en: At the championships more promising divers are expected to come to the fore.
sentences.cn: 在这次比赛中,估计将会涌现更多优秀的跳水运动员.

sentences.en: Fresh from their semi-final win over Germany, Britain took a promising early lead.
sentences.cn: 刚刚在半决赛中战胜德国队的英国队开场便取得了领先，形势一片大好。

sentences.en: He was voted the most promising new actor for his part in the movie.
sentences.cn: 他因在该电影中扮演的角色而获评为最有前途的新演员。

sentences.en: How had this com-promising picture come into the possession of the press?
sentences.cn: 这张令人难堪的照片是怎么落到媒体手中的？

sentences.en: It used to be usual to bind out promising boys for many years.
sentences.cn: 过去,人们经常让有出息的男孩子拜师学艺好多年.

sentences.en: Mr Walesa burned his fingers by promising he would give every Pole 100m zlotys to start a business.
sentences.cn: 瓦文萨先生因为承诺给每个波兰人1亿兹罗提创办企业而尝到了苦果。

sentences.en: Promising as they are, superconducting cables aren't perfect.
sentences.cn: 尽管超导电缆的前景光明,却并非尽善尽美.

sentences.en: She is among the most promising players in her age group.
sentences.cn: 她是所在年龄组中最有前途的选手之一。

sentences.en: The Washington rumour mill suggests that the president secured his narrow majority only by promising all sorts of concessions.
sentences.cn: 华盛顿的谣言工厂暗示总统是在承诺作出种种让步后才获得微弱多数票的。

sentences.en: This small part was taken with elan by a promising young tenor.
sentences.cn: 这一小段由一位大有前途的青年男高音倾情演绎。

words.tran_cn: 充满希望地；大有可为地
允诺，许诺；给人以…的指望或希望
许诺，答应（promise的现在分词形式）

phrases.tran_cn: n. 发展前景；光明的前途
发展潜力大的市场；有销路的市场

trans.tran_en: showing signs of being successful or good in the future

trans.tran_cn: 许诺，答应（promise的现在分词形式）
